instruction.instruction_text: "Exit the room, turn right and go downstairs, enter the dining room, and stop in front of the refrigerator at the farthest point to wait for me."
"Take two steps forward, turn right, and walk into the farthest room. After entering the room, walk to the corner that is farthest from you, then turn back and return to the starting point."
"Walk forward, turn left and go downstairs. After reaching the basement, turn back and return to the first floor, then walk to the coffee table directly in front of the stairs and stop next to it."
"Look to the right, go upstairs, turn right, walk to the farthest end of the corridor into the gym, and stop behind the treadmill in the gym to wait for me."

"Leave the gym, walk down the corridor, turn left into the bathroom, and stop next to the bathtub. Then turn around and walk back, entering the bedroom across from the bathroom, and stop in front of the bed lamp that is farthest from you in the bedroom."
"Leave the bedroom, turn right and walk through the corridor, enter the living room, and stop in front of the TV to wait for me."
"First, walk to the nearest toilet on the first floor in front of you, turn around and walk back, then enter the toilet that is farther from your starting point and stop to wait for me."

"First, enter the twin-bedroom on the left side of the corridor, walk to the bed that is farther from you, turn around and walk back. Then, go to the king-size bedroom on the right side of the corridor and stop in front of the bed to wait for me."
"Leave the bedroom, turn around, and walk to the farthest small room from you. Then turn back, walk through the corridor to the living room, turn left, and walk down another corridor to the end."
"Walk to the door of this room, then turn back and return to the area near your starting point."
"Enter the bedroom on the right front, walk into the bedroom's bathroom, and walk to the deepest part of the bathroom to stop."
"Leave the room, walk to the chair closest to you behind the dining table in the living room, then turn around and walk back to the starting point."
"Leave the room, go upstairs, turn right on the second floor, walk to the middle room of the three rooms, and then walk to the deepest part of the room."

"Turn around and walk to the toilet in front of the toilet bowl, then turn back and walk to the farthest room on the second floor. Stop at the closest point to you inside the room, which is by the door, and wait for me."
"Go downstairs, turn left on the first floor, and stop behind the single sofa closest to you in the living room to wait for me."
"Turn around, walk forward into the dining room, and walk to the back of the dining chair on the far left side of the restaurant."
"Climb the stairs, enter the balcony directly in front of the stairs, then enter the bedroom from the balcony and walk to the farthest side of the bedroom, next to the bedside lamp."
"Leave this bedroom, walk to the farthest bedroom on the second floor, and walk to the bedside lamp on the far right side of the room."
"Go downstairs, turn left into the living room, then turn left again and walk straight to the garden door at the farthest point, and stop there."
"Walk to the sofa closest to you in the living room, then turn around and return to the starting point."

"Exit from the corridor on the right side of the balcony, enter the first office, walk to the door that separates the office from the laundry room, then turn back and leave the office. Walk to the washing machine that is closest to you in the laundry room and stop there."
"Climb the stairs, go to the second floor, and enter the leftmost king-size bedroom. Stop in front of the bed and wait for me."
"Walk through the corridor in front of you, enter the farthest small bedroom, walk to the front of the small bed, then turn around and walk back along the same path to the starting point."
"Go downstairs, turn left on the first floor, enter the room closest to you, and stop in front of the TV to wait for me."
"Leave the room, walk to the farthest room on your right, walk to the bed, then turn around and walk back along the same path to the starting point."
"Go downstairs, turn right, enter the activity room, first walk to the closest corner of the pool table, then move counterclockwise to the farthest corner and stop there."
"Walk to the chair closest to you in front of you, then turn right and walk across the entire living room to stop in front of the fireplace at the farthest point."
"Go downstairs to the basement, turn right into the storage room, walk to the deepest point, then turn around and return to the starting point."

"There are two rooms in front of you. First, enter the laundry room closest to you, walk to the washing machine that is nearest to you in the room, then turn around and exit. Next, walk to the farthest toilet, and stop inside."
"Go upstairs, walk to the deepest part of the bathroom directly in front of the stairs, then turn around and walk back to the top of the stairs on the second floor."

"Starting from the reference point, first walk to the bed in the bedroom on the left, then turn around and walk to the bed in the bedroom on the right. Finally, walk to the bed in the blue bedroom behind you and stop there."
"Go downstairs to the first floor, exit through the front door, and stop next to the coffee table in front of the door."

Go downstairs to the basement, turn left into the room, walk to the closest chair behind you, then turn around and walk into the room on the right. Walk to the farthest point in the room, underneath the largest painting.
"Walk through the corridor to the farthest point in the gym, in front of the treadmill, then turn around and walk into the bedroom. Stop next to the bedside table on the right side of the bed."

Walk to the bedroom at the end of the corridor and stop by the bed. Then turn around, walk to the bathroom on your right that you just passed, enter the bathroom, and walk to the farthest toilet to stop and wait for me.
Walk to the farthest table in the living room, then turn left and walk to the refrigerator. Finally, walk the shortest distance to return to the starting point.
Walk to the wardrobe in the bedroom, then exit the bedroom, turn left, and walk into the nearest bedroom on the left. Walk to the bed and stop there.
Walk to the chair farthest from you in front of you, then turn around and walk back along the same path to the starting point.
First, walk to the front door, then turn around and return to the starting point. After that, walk to the chair closest to you in the dining room.
First, walk around the fireplace in a full circle, then walk into the corridor directly in front of you and continue until you reach the deepest part of the corridor. Stop there.

First, walk down the corridor on your left to the end and enter the gym, then turn around and walk back to the bedroom on your right. Walk to the piano, then turn around and return to the starting point.

First, walk up the stairs until you reach the point where you can't go further, then turn around and come back down. Turn right and then left twice, and walk to the farthest point in the living room, stopping in front of the middle glass.
Walk straight ahead to the side of the dining table, then turn around and walk back along the same path to the starting point.
First, walk into the bathroom and stand next to the sink, then turn around and exit. Turn right, walk through the dining room, and stop in front of the floor-to-ceiling glass door at the back.
Enter the kitchen, walk to the oven first, then turn around and walk to the sink, stopping there to wait for me.
First, walk to the back of the computer chair closest to you, then walk to the two-seater sofa at a distance. Turn right and walk to the front of the TV and stop there.
Go downstairs, turn left, enter the bedroom, and walk to the farthest bedside table. Then turn around, walk back along the same path, and stop at the top of the stairs.
Go downstairs, walk toward the right rear, enter the first room on the left, then find the bathroom. Walk to the farthest toilet in the bathroom and stop there.
Go down two flights of stairs, then turn left and walk to the nearest fireplace and stop there.
Walk toward the dining room in front of you, first walk to the refrigerator, then walk to the microwave, and finally turn around and walk to the side of the dining table.
Walk straight ahead, turn right, enter the room, and stop behind the chair closest to you.
Walk forward, go up the stairs to the next floor, then enter the nearest bathroom on your left and walk to the farthest part of the bathroom.
Walk into the corridor ahead, enter the first laundry room on your right, and stop next to the washing machine closest to you.
Walk into the bedroom closest to you ahead, cross the bedroom to the deeper part, enter the innermost room, and stop in front of the larger blue-green box.

Enter the living room, walk forward around the dining table, then walk to the farthest point in the living room in front of the two-seater sofa. Stop there and turn around to look at the dining table.
Walk to the farthest workroom ahead, then turn around and walk to the kitchen sink and stop there.
Walk forward, pass through the corridor, laundry room, and kitchen, then turn right and walk to the rightmost chair in the row of chairs closest to you in the living room. Stop behind it.
Go upstairs, turn left, and walk to the farthest green plant in the living room. Stop next to it.
Walk to the kitchen in the right front, go to the sink in the kitchen, then turn around, go downstairs, and stop at the bottom of the stairs on the first floor.

Turn left into the activity room, first walk to the TV at the far left corner of the room, then walk to the farthest point at the other end of the room to the leather chair. Finally, return to the starting point.
Go upstairs, turn right, walk through the corridor to the farthest bedroom, and stop at the deepest point of the bedroom, which is the farthest from you.

Enter the adjacent kitchen, walk to the stove, then turn right to leave the kitchen. Turn left and walk along the corridor to the farthest bedroom on the left. Stop in front of the vanity mirror in the bedroom.
Walk toward the room directly in front of you, go to the farthest point in the room from your position, then turn around and walk back along the same path to the vanity mirror.
Walk to the farthest sofa in front of you, then turn around and walk to the sofa closest to your starting position.
Walk to the corridor ahead, enter the room on the left side of the corridor, and stop next to the piano that is closest to you.
Walk to the farthest bedroom, then walk to the farthest point in the bedroom. After that, turn around and return to the armchair outside the corridor next to the handrail.
First, walk to the sliding door leading to the garden, then turn left and walk to the farthest washing machine in the laundry room and stop there.
Walk to the sofa farthest from you in your line of sight, then turn around and walk to the sofa closest to you in your line of sight.
Enter the room on the far left in front of you, then walk as far as possible into the room and stop at the deepest point.
Walk around the wall behind the bookshelf, enter the bedroom on the far right, and stop in front of the TV in the bedroom to wait for me.

Starting from the reference point, first walk to the middle cushion of the rightmost three-seater sofa, then turn around and walk to the middle sofa. Finally, walk to the cushion on the left side of the leftmost two-seater sofa.
Walk to the farthest point on this floor, in front of a TV.
Go upstairs, turn left and around the corner on the second floor, then walk to the farthest wall corner from the stairs.
Walk to the farthest point in the corridor, then enter the room on the right and walk to the deepest part of the room and stop there.
Go downstairs, enter the room directly in front of the stairs, and walk all the way to the deepest part of the room until you can't go any further.
Climb up two flights of stairs, then walk to the door of the nearest room and stop there.
Go down one floor, turn right, walk to the nearest bathroom in the corridor, and walk to the farthest toilet in the bathroom.
Go upstairs, enter the gym closest to the stairs, and stop in front of the elliptical machine.
Go down the stairs ahead, walk to the very end, and then return to the staircase entrance upstairs.
Go into the bedroom on your right ahead, get onto the bed from the steps on its right, and stop in the very center of the bed.
Go down the stairs and turn right, stop in front of the large sofa closest to you.

Go into the room in front of you, walk to the television at the furthest end of the room, then return to the staircase entrance, go upstairs, enter the nearest restroom to you on the second floor, and stop in front of the toilet.
Walk around the bed from the left to the right.
Go around the toilet from left to right.
Go around the vanity from the toilet side to the door side.
Walk around the coffee table.
Go around the wardrobe to the other side.
Walk halfway around your desk to the other side.
Please go around the table, sticking close to the back of the couch, to get behind the lamp on the table over there.
Please go around the table, hugging the backs of the two chairs on your right, and stop behind the chair opposite.
Please walk all the way around this table and the chairs beside it, staying close, and come back to where you began.
Please go along the table to the gas stove.
Stay close to the red volcano, and go most of the way around to the back of the pillar.
Walk around the outside of the crib to the opposite headboard.
Walk around the shower screen to get to the showerhead.
Walk counter-clockwise around the glass coffee table once.
Go around the sofa from left to right.
Follow the TV stand around to the other side.
From the right side of the bed, go around to the left side against the wall.
Walk around the counter to the other side, behind the second chair on the right.
Go halfway around the dining table with the flowers, staying tight to it.
Go around the bed to the lamp on the other side.
Go halfway around this row of couches and stop at the one on the end.
Walk halfway around the sofa, skirting the coffee table, to the other end.
Go halfway around the table to the other side, under the blinds.
Walk halfway around the bed to the nightstand on the other side.
Walk along the vanity until you're directly in front of the mirror.
Walk halfway around the cabinet to the other side.
Go along the sofa to the other end, hugging the wall.
Go around the middle table counter-clockwise once.
Go around to the opposite side of the table, starting from your right.
Hug the cabinet and go around to the other end.
Walk along the left side of the bed and stop at the nightstand.
Walk along the piano to the other end.
Walk around the table clockwise once.
Go around the sofa on the left and stop behind it.
Go into the bedroom, walk to the nightstand on the left side of the bed, then turn and walk halfway around the bed, hugging it, and stop at the bedside lamp on the right.
Go out of the bathroom, into the bedroom, go halfway around the cabinet, and stop at the innermost door.
Go through the hallway, into the dining room, and walk all the way around the table starting from the end closest to the door.
Go into the meeting room and take a full lap around the table.
First, circle halfway around the conference table to the other side, then walk to the coffee table and circle all the way around it.
Walk along the sofa to the curtains, then go along the wall and the TV stand to the TV.
Go all the way around this empty room, hugging the wall, until you're back where you started.
Go around the toilet, step out of the bathroom, and stop at the first sink.
Go upstairs to the guest room, go halfway around the desk, and then stop.
Head into the restaurant, go over to the table, and take two steps to your left.
Walk around to the inner side of the counter, hugging it all the way to the oven.
Go downstairs and walk all the way around the sofa, sticking close to it.
Walked over to the table, then turned around and came back.
Go down the hall to the toilet and come right back.
Go upstairs, walk to the far end of the living room, and stop.
Go into the study and wait for me at the furthest spot from the entrance.
Please leave the bathroom, go into the bedroom, and go to the very back of the room and wait for me.
Leave the bedroom, go to the bathroom, walk to the far end of it, then turn around and come back to the other side of the bed.
Wait for me in the closest stall in the bathroom down the hall.
Go down the hall, past the bathroom but don't go in, into the laundry room, and all the way to the back.
Walk to the very end of the hallway, turn around, and on your way back, go into the kitchen, walk to its very end, turn around again, and return to your starting point.
Get out of the bathroom, go into the bedroom, and wait for me at the furthest point from you.
Go from your bedroom, through the hall, to the living room dining table. Of the two chairs closest to you, stand behind the rightmost one and wait for me.
Walk through the living room to the balcony door, then turn around and go back the way you came.
Go into the bathroom in the bedroom, go all the way to the back, and wait for me there.
Walk into the living room, go over to the dining table, and stop behind the chair furthest away from you.
Walk into the studio, go to the very back, turn around, and walk back out.
Go straight to the back of the room, then turn around and come straight back to the start.
Go up the stairs to the furthest point on the second floor and stop.
Go up the stairs to the second floor, turn left, go to the farthest bedroom, and then walk to the very back of that room and stop.
Find the bedroom furthest from you on the second floor, and stop at the very end of its left side.
Find the stairs and go down, then walk straight until you find the speaker furthest from you in the room, and stop in front of it.
Walk to the farthest window in your line of sight from where you started, and stop there.
Go through several hallways to the very last door.
From your bedroom, walk to the leftmost bedroom, and stop in front of the bed that's furthest away from you.
Climb the stairs in front of you, go to the second floor, then walk to the dining chair at the farthest point on your left, and stop there to wait for me
Go to the very back of the kitchen, which is ahead and to your right, and then retrace your steps back to the bathroom.
Go through the hall, into the living room, walk to the cushion at the far end of the couch, and stop there to wait for me.
Walk into the restaurant, go behind the head chair at the far end of the table from you, and stop.
Walk into the double room on your right, and stop in front of the single bed all the way in the back.
Walk all the way to the chair furthest from you in the restaurant and wait for me.
Head up the stairs to the second floor, turn right into the bedroom, then head over to the sofa at the very back and stop there.
Go to the furthest spot on the second floor from your starting point, then head back.
First, walk to the computer chair that's further away from you, then walk to the one closer to you and stop.
Take the stairs down to the ground floor and stop at the nearest chair.
Go down the stairs, find the yellow chair on your left that's a little further down, and stop in front of it.
Walk through the entire first-floor living room to the red sofa at the very back. Then return to your starting point the same way, trying to go as straight as possible.
Go up the stairs to the second floor, walk to the last bedroom, and stop by the window to wait for me.
Walk into the living room and go to the leftmost couch, then take a clockwise path past three couches from left to right, and return to your starting point.
From where we start, within your line of sight, go behind the chair furthest away, then turn around and come back behind the closest one, and wait for me there.
Go up to the second floor, find the very last bedroom, and stop in front of the bed.
Go straight down the hall, and whenever you can't go any further straight, make a right. Keep doing that until you can't turn right anymore.
Go to the leftmost room, enter it, go to the very back, and wait for me.
Go up the stairs, and once you're upstairs, look around for the farthest spot from you on that floor, go over there and wait for me.
Go down two floors, then on that floor, find the closest bedroom, enter it and stop in front of the bed.
Go out and turn right, head to the bedroom at the end of the hall, and once inside, walk to the corner furthest from your starting point.
Walk into the bedroom, stop at the leftmost bedside lamp, then go to the rightmost armchair, and finally, head back to your starting point and stop.
Go down the hall, turn into the laundry room on your right, and stop at the washing machine all the way on the right.
Go into the living room, stop next to the cushion on the couch farthest from you, and wait for me.
Head into the room a little further down on your right, then go behind the chair furthest from you in that room and wait for me.
Walk forward to the leftmost chair, then continue to the rightmost chair and stop.
First, walk to the furthest point from you in this room, then leave this room, go into the bathroom on your right, and walk to the furthest point inside there and stop.
Go all the way down the hall to the very last room, then once you're in, go to the farthest spot from the door and stop.
Go straight through the living room and stop by the plant by the window at the very end.
Go upstairs, stop by the bed in the leftmost bedroom, then head to the bed in the rightmost bedroom and wait for me.
Go straight, then make a left when it's time. Go to the farthest washing machine and wait for me there.
Go upstairs, head into the room all the way on the right, and go all the way to the back and stop.
Go to the bedroom furthest down the hall, walk to the head of the bed, then come back to where you started.
Go downstairs, go all the way to the farthest point on the first floor, and wait for me.
Go to the furthest bedroom, then to the further bedside table, then to the en-suite toilet, and finally, come back to where you began.
Please go upstairs, turn right, walk to the far end of the bedroom, then turn around, take two steps, and wait for me.
First, walk to the toilet bowl in the nearest first-floor restroom, double back to your starting point, then walk to the toilet bowl in the furthest restroom from you, and double back again.
Go straight, then turn right into the closest bedroom, walk to the bed at the very back of that room, and stop.
Walk to the tub in the upstairs bathroom, then come back to where you started.
Go over to the ladder for the upstairs bedroom, then turn around and go back to where you started, then make a right and stop at the closest sink.
Go to the trash can in the living room, then head back to your bedroom and wait for me by the closest set of curtains to you.
Walk to the bedroom toilet, then turn around and head back, but go through the walk-in closet instead.
Go around the dining table, to the farthest left window on the balcony, stop and wait for me.
Go into the furthest toilet on your left, turn around before the toilet bowl, and walk back the way you came.
Leave this room, turn left down the hall, go to the last room on your left, and once you're in there, walk to the furthest corner and stop.
Head downstairs, go into the leftmost laundry room, walk to the tallest cabinet, turn around, and stop back at the stairs.
First, walk to the kitchen sink and back, then to the fridge and back.
Go down the corridor to the room at the very end, and once you're inside, go over to the glass on the far right and wait for me.
Go downstairs, turn right, walk through the hallway and living room, and stop in front of the farthest balcony glass door on the first floor.
